extendedInfo.description: If you are Above & Beyond's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Above & Beyond's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Above & Beyond's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Above & Beyond's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Tri-State- Group Therapy************************List of lyrics ************************- Air For Life- Alchemy- Alone Tonight- Black Room Boy- Can't Sleep- Every Little Beat- For All I Care- Giving It Out- Good For Me- Home- Liquid Love- Love Is Not Enough- On My Way To Heaven- Only A Few Things- Stealing Time- Sun & Moon- Sweetest Heart- Thing Called Love- With Your Hope- You Got To Go
